title: Who dares doubt my skill at this game?
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/9fbc6312a91252cef2e5af8e17ecd172.png

The road to rank 1 begins now. Whoever's rank 1 better watch out because I'm coming for you.

replies.body:
5 CS per minute isn't a challenger sort of score, that is legitmately some Silver/Bronze CSing.

Whatever App you are using is shit.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ubAyzoi9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-26T05:03:15.667+0000)
>
> 5 CS per minute isn't a challenger sort of score, that is legitmately some Silver/Bronze CSing.
> 
> Whatever App you are using is shit.

Its called the "Dick Measuring App"

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ubAyzoi9,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-11-26T05:10:55.219+0000)
>
> Its called the "Dick Measuring App"

And a tiny dick the OP has as well.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ubAyzoi9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-26T05:03:15.667+0000)
>
> 5 CS per minute isn't a challenger sort of score, that is legitmately some Silver/Bronze CSing.

Indeed. I can tell from the fact that it says "185 CS" at "5 CS per minute" that it was a ~37 minute game, which definitely fits a typical bronze/silver CS score.

You go look at a match that a master or challenger player plays and you'll likely see an average of ~10+ CS per minute (double the shown score), averaging with 100 CS for every 10 minutes of game time.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ubAyzoi9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-26T05:03:15.667+0000)
>
> 5 CS per minute isn't a challenger sort of score, that is legitmately some Silver/Bronze CSing.
> 
> Whatever App you are using is shit.

Excuse me, this app was recommended by QTPIE. RANK 1 ADC. RANK 1 LADDER NA. This app is legit and 100% accurate.

"Advertised products are 100% legit"

you should know not to take anything as 100% legit from League youtubers, they have been trying to sell us shit that doesn't do anything for years.
I don't even play ranked and I'm shit at this game and would likely beat you....

> [{quoted}](name=Plutooh,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ubAyzoi9,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-11-26T07:04:29.678+0000)
>
> I don't even play ranked and I'm shit at this game and would likely beat you....

How would you determin that? Isnt this game is team oriented... oh, my mistake, I forgot, its only team oriented for rank gold +.

> Who dares doubt my skill at this game?

Everyone.

Everyone dares doubt your skill.

Well... I'm Bronze V and I keep getting Challenger scores...

Something tells me this app isn't too great, and all it's doing is boosting the ego of those people stuck in low elo "because of their team" and give them even more of a superiority complex.

> [{quoted}](name=Akkordian Zoeve,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ubAyzoi9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-26T04:48:38.307+0000)
>
> Well... I'm Bronze V and I keep getting Challenger scores...
> 
> Something tells me this app isn't too great, and all it's doing is boosting the ego of those people stuck in low elo "because of their team" and give them even more of a superiority complex.

I stopped reading after I saw Bronze V because I can assume it's all nonsense.
